Posts.Content: Nov 10, 2009 09:08AM sherrypl wrote: When people that have not been through this give me advise like that I tell them that it is good to know that they know what they will do if they are ever faced with a similar diagnoses and I hope they can remember all the good advice they gave me.  They get the strangest look on their face.  I don't do it to be mean but just to put it in perspective for them, it seems to work.
